count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

AgentLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Agent entities.
x-model-examples: `name:DefaultAgent` - find agent with `DefaultAgent` name.
`pool:(<agentPoolLocator>),connected:true` - find all connected agents in a pool found by `agentPoolLocator`.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

AgentPoolLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering AgentPool entities.
x-model-examples: `name:Default`  find `Default` agent pool details.
`project:(<projectLocator>)`  find pool associated with project found by `projectLocator`.

action.description: Use `$help` to get the full list of supported actions.

buildType.description: Related build type or template locator.

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

lookupLimit.description: Limit processing to the latest `<lookupLimit>` entities.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

user.description: Locator of user who caused the audit event.

AuditLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering AuditEvent entities.
x-model-examples: `count:1000`  find last `1000` audit events.
`user:(<userLocator>)`  find last 100 events by user found by `userLocator`.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

BranchLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Branch entities.
x-model-examples: `build:<buildLocator>` - find branch with which the build found by `buildLocator` was started.
`buildType:<buildTypeLocator>` - find branches of a build configuration found by `buildTypeLocator`.

agentTypeId.description: typeId of agent used to execute build.

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

defaultFilter.description: If true, applies default filter which returns only "normal" builds (finished builds which are not canceled, not failed-to-start, not personal, and on default branch (in branched build configurations)).

finishDate.description: Requires either date or build dimension.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

lookupLimit.description: Limit processing to the latest `<lookupLimit>` entities.

queuedDate.description: Requires either date or build dimension.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

startDate.description: Requires either date or build dimension.

taskId.description: ID of a build or build promotion.

user.description: For personal builds checks the owner of the build, triggerring user in other cases.

BuildLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Build entities.
x-model-examples: `id:1`  find build with ID `1`.
`buildType:<buildTypeLocator>`  find builds under build configuration found by `buildTypeLocator`.
`defaultFilter:false,agent:<agentLocator>`  find builds executed on agent found by `agentLocator`, with `defaultFilter` disabled (see below).

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

BuildQueueLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Build entities.
x-model-examples: `buildType:<buildTypeLocator>`  find queued builds under build configuration found by buildTypeLocator.
`user:<userLocator>`  find queued builds started by user found by userLocator.

BuildTriggerCustomization.description: Represents build customization settings of a trigger

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

BuildTypeLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering BuildType entities.
x-model-examples: `name:MyBuildType`  find build configuration with `MyBuildType` name
`project:<projectLocator>`  find build configurations under project found by `projectLocator`

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

sinceChange.description: Commit SHA since which the changes should be returned.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

ChangeLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Change entities.
x-model-examples: `username:MyVCSUsername`  find last 100 changes made by user with `MyVCSUsername` VCS username.
`pending:true,buildType:<buildTypeLocator>`  find all pending changes on build configuration found by `buildTypeLocator`.

ChangeStatus.description: Aggregated statuses of the first builds with this change. Fairly expensive to compute.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

CloudImageLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering CloudImage entities.
x-model-examples: `name:MyImage` - find image with name `MyImage`.
`profile:<profileLocator>` - find all images in cloud profile found by `profileLocator`.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

CloudInstanceLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering CloudInstance entities.
x-model-examples: `agent:<agentLocator>` - find cloud instance which hosts agent found by `agentLocator`.
`profile:<profileLocator>` - find all cloud instances in cloud profile found by `profileLocator`.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

CloudProfileLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering CloudProfile entities.
x-model-examples: `name:MyCloudProfile` - find cloud profile with `MyCloudProfile` name.
`project:<projectLocator>` - find all cloud profiles under project found by `projectLocator`.

FileChange.description: Represents the specific file change (in the scope of the commit).

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

lookupLimit.description: Limit processing to the latest `<lookupLimit>` entities.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

InvestigationLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Investigation entities.
x-model-examples: `assignee:John Smith`  find investigations assigned to `John Smith`.
`state:taken`  find investigations which are currently in work.

Issue.description: Represents an issue related to the specific change.

IssueUsage.description: Represents a relation between the issue and the Changes entity.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

MuteLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Mute entities.
x-model-examples: `project:<projectLocator>`  find muted problem under project found by `projectLocator`.
`type:test`  find last 100 muted tests.

ParsedTestName.description: Represents test metadata (package, method, class, and so on).

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

lookupLimit.description: Limit processing to the latest `<lookupLimit>` entities.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

ProblemLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Problem entities.
x-model-examples: `currentlyInvestigated:true`  find last 100 build problems which are being currently investigated.
`build:<buildLocator>`  find build problems under build found by `buildLocator`.

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

lookupLimit.description: Limit processing to the latest `<lookupLimit>` entities.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

ProblemOccurrenceLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering ProblemOccurrence entities.
x-model-examples: `currentlyInvestigated:true`  find last 100 build problem occurrences which are being currently investigated.
`build:<buildLocator>`  find build problem occurrences under build found by `buildLocator`.

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

ProjectLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Project entities.
x-model-examples: `name:MyProject`  find a project with name `MyProject`.
`archived:false`  find projects which are not archived.

Resolution.description: Represents an investigation resolution timestamp and details.

Revision.description: Represents a revision related to a VCS change.

Revisions.description: Represents a list of Revision entities.

StateField.description: Represents a project state field (as of now, limited to the read-only state of project).

TagLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Tag entities.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

TeamCityNodeLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Node entities.
x-model-examples: `id:node-1` - find a node with id `node-1`.
`state:<stateLocator>` - find all nodes having the given state.
`role:<role>` - finds a node with the specified role, possible values are: main_node or secondary_node.

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

lookupLimit.description: Limit processing to the latest `<lookupLimit>` entities.

muteAffected.description: Build type locator (for finding out if this test is affected by mutes in build type).

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

TestLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Test entities.
x-model-examples: `currentlyInvestigated:true`  find last 100 tests which are being currently investigated.
`build:<buildLocator>`  find tests under build found by `buildLocator`.

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

lookupLimit.description: Limit processing to the latest `<lookupLimit>` entities.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

TestOccurrenceLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering TestOccurrence entities.
x-model-examples: `currentlyInvestigated:true`  find last 100 test occurrences which are being currently investigated.
`build:<buildLocator>`  find test occurrences under build found by `buildLocator`.

TriggeredBy.description: Represents the user/trigger/dependency which caused this build to start.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

UserGroupLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering Group entities.
x-model-examples: 'name:MyGroupName'  find group with name `MyGroupName`.
'key:MyGroupKey'  find group with key `MyGroupKey`.

affectedGroup.description: User group (direct or indirect parent) locator.

current.description: Return user that has issued this request.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

UserLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering User entities.
x-model-examples: `name:John Smith`  find user with name `John Smith`.
`group:<groupLocator>`  find all users in user group found by `groupLocator`.

VcsCheckStatus.description: Represents the last known repository check status.

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

lookupLimit.description: Limit processing to the latest `<lookupLimit>` entities.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

VcsRootInstanceLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering VcsRootInstance entities.
x-model-examples: `vcsRoot:<vcsRootLocator>`  find all VCS root instances of a VCS root found by `vcsRootLocator`.
`project:<projectLocator>`  find all VCS root instances defined under project found by `projectLocator`.

count.description: For paginated calls, how many entities to return per page.

item.description: Supply multiple locators and return a union of the results.

lookupLimit.description: Limit processing to the latest `<lookupLimit>` entities.

start.description: For paginated calls, from which entity to start rendering the page.

VcsRootLocator.description: Represents a locator string for filtering VcsRoot entities.
x-model-examples: `type:jetbrains.git`  find all `Git`-typed VCS roots.
`project:<projectLocator>`  find all VCS roots defined under project found by `projectLocator`.

agent-requirement.description: Represents a requirement to agent parameters.

agent-requirements.description: Represents a list of AgentRequirement entities.

agentPools.description: Represents a paginated list of AgentPool entities.

agents.description: Represents a paginated list of Agent entities.

approvalInfo.description: Represents approval status for this build, if applicable.

artifact-dependencies.description: Represents a list of ArtifactDependency entities.

auditEvent.description: Represents an audit event including a user and affected entities.

auditEvents.description: Represents a paginated list of AuditEvent entities.

branch.description: Represents a branch on which this build has been started.

branches.description: Represents a list of Branch entities.

properties.description: Parameters defined by users. Includes parameters added in custom builds. See "originalProperties" for more information.

resultingProperties.description: Actual parameters reported by a build agent after a build finishes. To get the initial parameters reported when a build started, use "startProperties" instead.

originalProperties.description: User-defined parameters from the build configuration ("BuildType" in REST API). See "properties" for more information.

startProperties.description: Actual parameters reported by a build agent when a build starts. To get the final parameters reported when a build finishes, use "resultingProperties" instead.

buildCancelRequest.description: Represents a cancel request for the specific build.

buildChange.description: Represents links to the next or previous build.

buildChanges.description: Represents a list of BuildChange entities.

buildTriggeringOptions.description: Represents the dependency/queue settings with which this build has been started.

buildTypes.description: Represents a paginated list of BuildType entities.

builds.description: Represents a paginated list of Build entities.

changes.description: Represents a paginated list of Change entities.

cloudImage.description: Represents a cloud instance image saved with a profile.

cloudImages.description: Represents a paginated list of CloudImage entities.

cloudInstances.description: Represents a paginated list of CloudInstance entities.

cloudProfiles.description: Represents a paginated list of CloudProfile entities.

comment.description: Represents a dated comment of the specific user.

commiter.description: Represents a commiter to a VCS.

compatibilities.description: Represents a list of Compatibility entities.

compatibility.description: Represents a compatibility relation between the agent and build configuration.

compatibilityPolicy.description: Represents a build configuration run policy and included build configurations.

customizations.description: Represents build customizations (artifact dependency overrides, custom parameters or changesets).

datas.description: Represents a list of MetaData entities.

disabledResponsibilities.description: Represents a set of responsibilities that are currently disabled but can be enabled on a TeamCity node.

downloadInfo.description: List of metadata on artifacts downloaded from [or provided by] a build.

downloadedArtifacts.description: Collection of artifacts metadata which were downloaded from dependencies of this build or delivered to ones depending on this build.

effectiveResponsibilities.description: Represents a set of effective responsibilities of a TeamCity node. A responsibility becomes effective once it is enabled in the server configuration and a responsible node detects this change and updates its state.

enabledInfo.description: Represents the current enablement status of the agent.

enabledResponsibilities.description: Represents a set of enabled responsibilities of a TeamCity node.

entries.description: Represents a list of Entry entities.

environment.description: Represents the details of the agent's OS.

features.description: Represents a list of Feature entities.

fileChanges.description: Represents a list of FileChange entities.

files.description: Represents a list of File entities.

groupApprovalRule.description: Represents group approval rule and its current status for the given build.

groupApprovals.description: Represents a list of GroupApprovalRule entities.

groups.description: Represents a list of Group entities.

healthCategories.description: Represents a paginated list of HealthCategory entities.

healthStatusItems.description: Represents a paginated list of HealthItem entities.

investigation.description: Represents an investigation of a build problem.

investigations.description: Represents a paginated list of Investigation entities.

issues.description: Represents a list of Issue entities.

issuesUsages.description: Represents a list of IssueUsage entities.

licenseKeys.description: Represents a list of LicenseKey entities.

licensingData.description: Represents license state details (available build configurations, agents, etc.).

links.description: Represents a list of Link entities.

metricTags.description: Represents a list of MetricTag entities.

metricValues.description: Represents a list of MetricValue entities.

metrics.description: Represents a list of Metric entities.

multipleOperationResult.description: Represents a list of OperationResult entities.

mutes.description: Represents a paginated list of Mute entities.

operationResult.description: Represents a relation between a message and a related entity.

permissionAssignment.description: Represents a relation between the specific permission and a project.

permissionAssignments.description: Represents a list of PermissionAssignment entities.

permissionRestriction.description: Represents permission restrictions of an authentication token.

permissionRestrictions.description: Represents a list of PermissionRestriction entities.

pinInfo.description: Represents the pinned status of this build.

plugins.description: Represents a list of Plugin entities.

problem.description: Represents an issue with the test.

problemOccurrence.description: Represents an instance of a failed test in the specific build.

problemOccurrences.description: Represents a paginated list of ProblemOccurrence entities.

problems.description: Represents a paginated list of Problem entities.

progress-info.description: Represents a progress estimate of this build.

projectFeatures.description: Represents a list of ProjectFeature entities.

projects.description: Represents a paginated list of Project entities.

properties.description: Represents a list of Property entities.

related.description: Represents a link to the Builds entity.

relatedEntities.description: Represents a list of RelatedEntity entities.

repositoryState.description: Represents the list of the repository Branch entities with their recent revisions.

requirements.description: Represents a list of unmet requirements of a build.

responsibility.description: Represents a single responsibility of a TeamCity node.

roles.description: Represents a list of Role entities.

server.description: Represents various details of this server including the installation version.

snapshot-dependencies.description: Represents a list of SnapshotDependency entities.

steps.description: Represents a list of Step entities.

tags.description: Represents a list of Tag entities.

testCounters.description: Represents a test results counter (how many times this test was successful/failed/muted/ignored).

testOccurrence.description: Represents a relation between a test and the specific build.

testOccurrences.description: Represents a paginated list of TestOccurrence entities.

testRunMetadata.description: Represents a list of TypedValue entities.

tests.description: Represents a paginated list of Test entities.

tokens.description: Represents a list of Token entities.

triggers.description: Represents a list of Trigger entities.

type.description: Represents a build parameter type string.

userApprovalRule.description: Represents user approval rule and its current status for the given build.

userApprovals.description: Represents a list of UserApprovalRule entities.

userAvatars.description: Represents a group of links to the user's avatars

users.description: Represents a list of User entities.

vcs-root-entries.description: Represents a list of VcsRootEntry entities.

vcs-root-entry.description: Represents a VCS root assigned to this build configuration.

vcs-root-instance.description: Represents a relation between a VCS root and unique settings set for this root.

vcs-root-instances.description: Represents a paginated list of VcsRootInstance entities.

vcs-roots.description: Represents a paginated list of VcsRoot entities.

vcsLabel.description: Represents a VCS-side label of this build's sources.

vcsLabels.description: Represents a list of VcsLabel entities.

vcsStatus.description: Represents links to the last or previous VCS root check.

versionedSettingsContextParameter.description: Represents a Versioned Settings Context Parameter.
versionedSettingsContextParameter.x-help-article-name: Storing Project Settings in Version Control

versionedSettingsContextParameters.description: Represents a Versioned Settings Context Parameters.
versionedSettingsContextParameters.x-help-article-name: Storing Project Settings in Version Control

versionedSettingsError.x-help-article-name: Storing Project Settings in Version Control

versionedSettingsStatus.x-help-article-name: Storing Project Settings in Version Control
